description: An older couple travels slowly in a covered wagon while another covered wagon is driven recklessly and at high speed ahead of them on a trail. The older couple expresses irritation at the behavior of the driver in the lead wagon. The scene highlights the absurdity of applying modern generational stereotypes to a historical frontier setting. The complaint focuses on the perceived disruptive nature of youth, juxtaposed with the challenging environment of the trail.
caption: "I wish they'd keep those danged teenagers off the trails."
